participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.background: I've always been afraid of heights, but I overcame my fear when I went bungee jumping. My job allows me to be myself and be creative. I am a lifestyle blogger. I m dumpy. I eat mainly Chinese food.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Fashionable, tall, and a bit complex.
participant_2.background: I treasure my collection of vintage clothing. I am six feet tall. Both my parents were over 6 foot tall. I like to wear red shoes also. I have two personalities, one that is nice to my family and one that is not so nice to others.

content.text: Nothing much. Just looking at some vintage clothing online.
Nice! I like to look at vintage clothes too. I also collect them.
Really? That's cool. What kind of vintage clothes do you collect?
I mainly collect dresses from the 50s and 60s.
Oh, that's cool. I like those decades too.
Me too. They have the best fashion.
Yeah, they do. I have a lot of vintage dresses too.
Nice! What's your favorite piece of vintage clothing?
It's a red dress from the 50s. It's so pretty.
Oh, I love that dress! I have a similar one.
Really? That's awesome! We should trade dresses.
